About Me

I am in my final semester in Austin Community College's User Experience/User Interface Design program. I'm a versatile designer with skills in UI, UX, and visual design.

My other interests include just enough understanding of HTML/CSS and prototyping tools to be a little bit dangerous. I always look for tools that can better the relationship between design and development.

Since being exposed to the principles of user-centered design, my world has become a design problem unto itself. I find myself constantly picking at and pulling stuff apart. In my free time I enjoy reading about emotional intelligence and people watching.

I'm obsessed with the Beat Generation â€” from Ralph Steadman's illustrations for Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas to Allan Ginsberg's Howl. I take respect, humility, and listening to others very seriously. These skills are key elements to help me better solve problems.
